Puluhan Atlet dan Pelatih Kota Cimahi Diganjar Kadeudeuh
03 Nov 2019, 05:28 by Ririn Nur Febriani
CIMAHI, (PR).- Harumkan Kota Cimahi, jajaran atlet dan pelatih yang menyumbang prestasi mendapat penghargaan dan kadeudeuh dari Pemkot Cimahi. Apresiasi diharapkan memotivasi para atlet untuk terus membela Kota Cimahi dan menghantarkan prestasi.
Penyerahan penghargaan berlangsung di Cimahi Technopark Jalan Baros Kota Cimahi. Penerima terdiri dari 36 atlet dan 7 pelatih, mereka menyumbang medali pada ajang Pekan Olahraga Pelajar Wilayah Daerah (Popwilda) II Jawa Barat dan Festival Pencak Silat Tingkat Jawa Barat tahun 2019. Mereka mewakili beberapa cabang olahraga (Cabor) seperti tenis meja, sepak takraw, pencak silat, tarung derajat, atletik, senam dan renang.
Wali Kota Cimahi Ajay M. Priatna mengatakan pemberian penghargaan ini merupakan bentuk apresiasi dari Pemkot Cimahi atas raihan prestasi para atlet dan pelatih.
"Allhamdulilah mereka sudah berhasil mengharumkan nama Kota Cimahi. Ini sebagai apresiasi, Pemkot Cimahi menyampaikan sedikit 'kadeudeuh'," ujarnya.
Kadeudeuh untuk atlet beregu yang mendapatkan medali emas mendapat uang pembinaan Rp 4 juta. Untuk atlet perorangan yang mendapat medali emas mendapat uang pembinaan Rp 1,5 juta, dan atlet perorangan peraih medail perak mendapatkan Rp 1 juta.
"Kami berharap terutama Dinas Kebudayaan Pariwisata Pemuda dan Olahraga (Disbudparora) tahun depan supaya ditingkatkan sebagai motivasi bagi para atlet," katanya.
Ajay tak memungkiri ada banyak atlet berprestasi asal Kota Cimahi yang memilih membela daerah lain dalam berbagai kejuaraan olahraga.
"Faktanya memang ada beberapa orang berprestasi asli Cimahi yang membela daerah lain," ungkapnya. Dikatakannya, ia dan berbagai pihak terkait akan membahas agar ke depan tidak ada lagi atlet berprestasi yang dibajak daerah lain.
Untuk menghadapi Pekan Olahraga Daerah (Porda) XIV 2022, Komite Olahraga Nasional Indonesia (KONI) Kota Cimahi ikat para atlet muda yang diproyeksi bisa memperoleh medali dengan kontrak panjang. Adapun jumlah atlet muda yang sudah dikontrak untuk membela Kota Cimahi disebutkan sebanyak 20 atlet. Mereka berasal dari 7 cabang olahraga diantaranya senam, atletik, taekwondo, tarung derajat, bulu tangkis dan menembak.Â 
"Kita berupaya ambil lagi atlet yang sudah dibajak daerah lain. Memang perlu kita perhatikan juga sarana prasarana pembinaan olahraganya supaya tetap membela Cimahi," katanya.***

Dozens of Cimahi City Athletes and Coaches rewarded Kadeudeuh
03 Nov 2019, 05:28 by Ririn Nur Febriani
CIMAHI, (PR) .- Awesome City of Cimahi, the ranks of athletes and coaches who contribute achievements get awards and kadeudeuh from the City Government of Cimahi. Appreciation is expected to motivate athletes to continue to defend Cimahi City and deliver achievements.
The award presentation took place at Cimahi Technopark Jalan Baros, Cimahi City. The recipients consisted of 36 athletes and 7 coaches, they contributed medals at the Regional Regional Student Sports Week II (Popwilda) II in West Java and the Pencak Silat Festival in West Java in 2019. They represented several sports (sports) such as table tennis, sepak takraw, martial arts, fighting, athletics, gymnastics and swimming.
Cimahi Mayor Ajay M. Priatna said the award was a form of appreciation from the Cimahi City Government for the achievements of athletes and coaches.
"Allhamdulillah, they have succeeded in making the name of the City of Cimahi. This as an appreciation, the City Government of Cimahi conveyed a little 'kadeudeuh'," he said.
Kadeudeuh for team athletes who get gold medals get coaching money of Rp 4 million. For individual athletes who get a gold medal, they receive coaching money of Rp. 1.5 million, and individual athletes who receive silver medal get Rp. 1 million.
"We hope that especially the Office of Youth Culture and Sports Tourism (Disbudparora) next year to be increased as motivation for athletes," he said.
Ajay did not deny that there were many outstanding athletes from Cimahi City who chose to defend other regions in various sports championships.
"The fact is that there are some people with genuine Cimahi achievements who are defending other regions," he said. He said, he and various related parties would discuss so that in the future no more outstanding athletes would be hijacked by other regions.
To face the Regional Sports Week (Porda) XIV 2022, the Indonesian National Sports Committee (KONI) Cimahi City tied the young athletes who were projected to get a medal with a long contract. The number of young athletes who have been contracted to defend Cimahi City is mentioned as many as 20 athletes. They came from 7 sports including gymnastics, athletics, taekwondo, fighting, badminton and shooting.
"We are trying to take more athletes who have been hijacked by other regions. Indeed, we also need to pay attention to the infrastructure of sports coaching facilities to keep defending Cimahi," he said. ***
